item.title: Python: Reading a JSON file
item.description: I've been playing around with some code to spin up AWS instances using Fabric and Boto and one thing that I wanted to do was define a bunch of default properties in a JSON file and then load this into a script. I found it harder to work out how to do this than I expected to so I thought I'd document it for future me! My JSON file looks like this:
